title: Can anyone identify this typeface?
content:
Hello guys, I have been struggling to find the name of this typeface to buy it online.  
My client has sent me a png and doesnt remeember where he got it from.  
I tried different websites to identify the type but always no result. I would be so glad if anyone could help me out here... thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture-1_4960.gif)

 [‹ ARENA HOMME PLUS magazine - text font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002439/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43880 "Go to previous forum topic") [Citizen - very heavy serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002439/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43920 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kj

comments.content: dialog and ela sans are similar, but not the same... if you client has a pdf with the typeface embedded in it, you’d be able to get the name from ’properties’
